greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Odd numbers k such that k^2 is an arithmetic number.
comment: Also, odd numbers k such that the arithmetic and geometric means of the divisors of k^2 are both integer.
Even numbers with this property are more rare and given by A107924.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Jun 10 2005
